comments: Numbers n such that x^n==1 (mod n) has solutions 2<=x<=n - _Benoit Cloitre_, May 10 2002
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = n + O(n/log log log n). - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 16 2012
